EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-07-Field-Central-RD-Sponsored-Houston.ES-2017-12-04-Houston-2.EM-201
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Houston Executive Networking Lunch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-houston]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event this Thursday, December 7th, at III Forks Steakhouse, a top rated restaurant in the Houston area serving the top choice USDA prime. We're expecting a quick lunch in partnership with Cisco filled with great conversations surrounding hybrid cloud strategy with your technology peers in industries such as healthcare, energy, education, and more. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us for networking and to learn more about Turbonomic, Cisco, and future readying your journey to the hybrid cloud. Houston Executive Networking Lunch <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-houston/]]>
Where: III Forks Houston <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-houston/]]> 1201 Fannin Suite 129, Houston, TX, 77002 On the corner of Dallas St. and San Jacinto St. Thursday, December 7th 12:00pm CT <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-houston/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
